articles.title: Jurgen Klopp is ready for a spectacular battle for the top four in the Premier League this season - Daily Mail
articles.description: JOE BERNSTEIN: Klopp's side face Leicester on Friday night five points off a Champions League spot , with the German working on the basis of five clubs fighting for two places
